name: sce_add_central_ice_storage
description: Adds an ice storage tank and controls to existing chilled water loop for the purpose of thermal energy storage.
modeler_description: The measure allows users attach ice thermal energy storage (ITS) to an existing chilled water loop for the purpose of exploring load flexibility potential for a given building.

arguments.name: stor_cap
arguments.description: Energy capacity of Ice thermal storage in ton-hours

arguments.name: charge_hours
arguments.description: Enter daily times for battery charging, using 24-hour format. Applies every day in the full run period.
